title: VocaHarmonica (VH)
description: AI-driven vocal harmony generation system that processes user vocals and produces musically aligned harmonies using audio intelligence pipelines. Designed for real-time interaction, downloadable outputs, and creative augmentation.

title: Speech Converter Pipeline (NEXUS)
description: End-to-end speech AI system converting speech → text → refined speech with audio enhancement. Production-ready pipeline with multimodal learning capabilities.

title: Agentic AI for Faculty-Centric Course Automation (NEXUS)
description: Agent-based AI system that converts syllabus PDFs into time-aware academic content: PPTs, PDFs, audio scripts, and video plans. Reduces faculty workload through intelligent automation.

title: CogniFriend
description: AI-powered personalized tutoring system using BERT-LSTM and transformer models (LLaMA-based). Adaptive learning via sentiment analysis, dynamic quizzes, and student profiling.

title: MoodBot Café
description: Full-stack emotion-aware conversational AI platform with secure authentication, RESTful APIs, and responsive dashboards. Designed for empathetic interaction and mental wellness support using NLP techniques.

title: Krishi Sakhi (SIH 2025)
description: AI-powered multilingual farming assistant with personalized chatbot intelligence. Integrated live weather, pest alerts, crop stages, market data, and voice interaction.

title: AlertNet
description: AI-based real-time accident detection and emergency alert system using computer vision (YOLO). Focus on safety-critical ML systems and real-time inference.

title: Gmail Summary App
description: API-driven productivity tool integrating Gmail APIs and NLP pipelines to summarize long email threads into concise highlights. Built with Node.js backend and clean frontend interface.

title: Solar Campus (Google × GFG Hackathon)
description: ML-driven solar panel recommendation engine using geospatial and weather data. XGBoost-based decision system for sustainability impact.

title: Cosmic Cruise
description: Full-stack web platform simulating space tourism exploration and booking, focused on clean UI design, dynamic components, and scalable backend APIs. Demonstrates end-to-end web engineering skills.

title: BookBee
description: Hybrid recommendation system (collaborative + content-based) with gamified discovery. Emphasizes algorithmic thinking and personalization strategies.

title: AYLA – From Silhouette to Stitch
description: AI-assisted fashion tech platform enabling body-aware, interactive garment design for Indian wear using computer vision and ML.
